BODY_HOME_INTRO: Hola, soy Nishant Suria. Hago vidéojuegos sobre el apellido N.S. Dawn.
BODY_HOME_INTERESTS: Outside of game design, I am interested in linguistics, multilingualism and second language pedagogy, world cultures and cuisines, and digital art. With my work, I seek to connect human conversation with play, and to demonstrate the power of language.
